title: [BUG] League Client (not alpha) not opening on macOS Sierra
body:
When I recently updated to macOS Sierra, I noticed that normally clicking the LoL icon doesn't open the patcher anymore. I have verified that the patcher is still working (Contents/LoL/RADS/lol_patcher/releases/*/deploy, then opening LoLPatcher then LoLPatcherUx), but it does not open like it should.

NOTE I do have the LCU installed

replies.body: Well your problem is .. you're using a Mac.. Lmaokai
Funny. It's a requirement for what I do
Mac is fine I don't understand people! As long as you have Windows installed.
This is happening to me too, it's fine on the previous version of Mac though. :/
